summary: WAS DRIVING DOWN HE HIGHWAY AT APPROXIMATELY 70 MPH WHEN THE CAR JUST STARTED DECELERATING ON ITS OWN DOWN TO 30 MPH.  THE "CHECK MANUAL" INDICATOR CAME ON, ALONG WITH A PICTURE OF THE ENGINE AND A WRENCH.  I WAS ABLE TO GET THE CAR TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD.  I SHUT THE CAR OFF FOR A FEW MINUTES, AND THEN TURNED IT BACK ON.  THIS TIME THE WARNING LIGHT CAME ON IMMEDIATELY.  I COULDN'T EVEN MOVE 30 FEET.  HAD TO BE TOWED FROM THE SIDE OF A BUSY HIGHWAY.
